statements: SELECT image_id, image_name, image_size FROM ImageDataset;
SELECT image_id, image_name, uploaded_at FROM ImageDataset ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImageDataset WHERE image_size > 1000;
SELECT image_id, image_name, uploaded_at FROM ImageDataset WHERE uploaded_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_size, uploaded_at FROM ImageDataset WHERE image_name LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM ImageDataset ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT image_name, image_size, uploaded_at FROM ImageDataset WHERE image_size > 1000 ORDER BY image_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM ImageDataset WHERE image_size BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 AND uploaded_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_size FROM ImageDataset WHERE uploaded_at <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY image_size DESC;
SELECT image_name, uploaded_at FROM ImageDataset WHERE image_name LIKE '%cat%' ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT image_id, image_filename FROM images WHERE image_filename LIKE '%example%';
SELECT label_name FROM labels;
SELECT image_id, image_filename FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_filename = 'example.jpg'
SELECT image_filename FROM images WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_filename LIKE '%cat%' ORDER BY image_id ASC;
SELECT label_name FROM labels WHERE label_id = 'c7d63ab2-cc1f-437e-8b02-c19dc17b695f' AND label_name = 'Cute';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM images WHERE image_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT image_id, image_filename, label_name FROM images JOIN labels ON images.image_id = labels.label_id ORDER BY label_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM images LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT label_name FROM labels ORDER BY label_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, label_id FROM image_labels WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM images JOIN image_labels ON images.image_id = image_labels.image_id WHERE image_labels.label_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT label_name, image_name FROM labels JOIN image_labels ON labels.label_id = image_labels.label_id JOIN images ON images.image_id = image_labels.image_id;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT image_name, COUNT(label_id) AS num_labels FROM images LEFT JOIN image_labels ON images.image_id = image_labels.image_id GROUP BY image_name;
SELECT DISTINCT image_id, image_name FROM images WHERE image_name ILIKE '%cat%';
SELECT * FROM Images;
SELECT image_id, image_description FROM Images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM Categories WHERE category_name = 'Nature';
SELECT image_id, category_id FROM ImageCategories ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT label_name, confidence FROM ImageLabels WHERE confidence > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Images;
SELECT image_id, image_description FROM Images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;

SELECT Images.image_id, Images.image_description, Categories.category_name FROM Images JOIN ImageCategories ON Images.image_id = ImageCategories.image_id JOIN Categories ON ImageCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT Images.image_id, Images.image_description, ImageLabels.label_name FROM Images JOIN ImageLabels ON Images.image_id = ImageLabels.image_id WHERE ImageLabels.confidence > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM images LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_name, upload_time FROM images ORDER BY upload_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT label_name FROM labels WHERE label_name = 'Nature';
SELECT image_id, feature_name, feature_value FROM image_features WHERE feature_value > 0.5 LIMIT 3;
SELECT image_id, description, date_added FROM image_metadata WHERE date_added < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name, upload_time FROM images WHERE image_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM labels WHERE label_name = 'Nature';
SELECT i.image_name, l.label_name FROM images i JOIN image_labels il ON i.image_id = il.image_id JOIN labels l ON l.label_id = il.label_id;
SELECT image_id, feature_name, feature_value FROM image_features WHERE image_id = 3;
